TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Manipulation2DCompletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Represents data that is sent with a **ManipulationProcessor2D.Completed** event or an **InertiaProcessor2D.Completed** event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This data applies to either a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.ManipulationProcessor2D.Completed?displayProperty=fullName> event or an <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaProcessor2D.Completed?displayProperty=fullName> event.

Docs.summary: Gets the new x-coordinate of the composite position of the manipulation.
Docs.value: The new x-coordinate of the composite position of the manipulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DCompletedEventArgs.OriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DCompletedEventArgs.OriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.

Docs.summary: Gets the new y-coordinate of the composite position of the manipulation.
Docs.value: The new y-coordinate of the composite position of the manipulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The origin point represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DCompletedEventArgs.OriginX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.Manipulation2DCompletedEventArgs.OriginY%2A> properties is the average position of all manipulators associated with an element.

Docs.summary: Gets the total amount of change since the manipulation started.
Docs.value: The total amount of change since the manipulation started.

Docs.summary: Gets the current velocities of the manipulation.
Docs.value: The current velocities of the manipulation.
